TopicTitle: I lose all sip controlls after i get to space.

Articles.Content: I have not modded anything. First I make a ship and everything works fine until I get to the point where I try to make an orbit. When I do this the entire ship locks down I can't tilt it or boost or go into different stages. All I can do is wait for it to crash to the earth/kerbin. This makes the game unplayable. I am looking for way to fix this. I am it on steam and have tried reinstalling it. If you know how to fix it then please tell me.

Hi XrainMT,

I'm going to guess that you are either running out of battery power or you do not have any torque modules installed. Without either of those, your craft is generally uncontrollable in space.

Beyond that, we would need to see either pictures or a .craft file in order to help you better.

Welcome to the forums!
